root.name: Taito Memories Pocket
root.description: There were a total of 16 games that were in between 1979 and 1989.List of GamesLunar RescueCrazy BalloonBalloon BomberQixAlpine SkiElevator ActionChack'n'PopThe Legend of KageThe Fairyland StoryKnight BoyRastanKuri KintonThe New Zealand StoryRaimaisRainbow Islands ExtraCameltry
